welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Montlhery, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and explore all that this picturesque destination has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals for different airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must accept terms and conditions to access.
